page.title: 20Millfield Nursery.
page.content: Mr. John Miller owns the Millfield Nurserys in Olveston. He opened the garden centre in 1977. His days start at 9.00a.m. and finishes at 5.30p.m. He is open seven days a week but does close for two months in the Winter. His stock mainly consist of shrubs, conifer trees, bedding and vegetable plants. The most popular plants he sells are his bedding plants. Many of these can be seen in gardens in and around Olveston. A large amount of trade comes from just passers-by because the nursery is conveniently positioned on one of the roads which passes through the village. Mr. Miller's personal preference in his stock are his bedding plants and conifers.
